Module ing.sw
Package IS24_LB11.game

Class Player

java.lang.Object
IS24_LB11.game.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
JsonConvertable
public class Player extends Object implements JsonConvertable
Represents a player in the game, holding the player's state and behaviors.
